item.title: Progress? Happy New Year (In May)
item.description: Wow, I said monthly updates… and here I am, updating 5/6 months later. I need to be better with this.

item.title: New Year (2023), New Me
item.description: Last time I updated this was in February of 2022. Whew. So much life has happened…goals achieved, goals dropped…and here I am, back again, to tell you nothing about them haha.

item.title: Website Revamp
item.description: Welcome to Rid1Studios 2.0. I’ve decided that it’s time to take my creative work a little more seriously. I realized at the end of the year 2021, my skills have improved greatly from where I started in 2019.
